contents.tooltip: More Information
contents.rollMessage:
All weapons require a 1d8 + Training to initiate. The following are merely examples of the weapons that can be chosen. No firearms.

Melee: Requires witch to be within 1m of enemy to attack. Polearms extend range to 2m.

  • Swords
  • Spears
  • Maces
  • Daggers
  • Scythes

Ranged: Requires witch to be within 3m of enemy to attack

  • Bows
  • Shuriken
  • Crossbows
  • Slings

Thrown: Some ranged and melee weapons can be thrown. Requires witch to be within 3m of enemy to attack.

  • Spear
  • Knives
  • Chakrams
